name: PepperTown
description:
RPG-style idle game for Mini Jam 22: Anime

Featuring characters from Pepper & Carrot

Click the shops to buy upgrades; when the girls kill all the slimes you win!

Made by congusbongus and StarNavigator

PepperTown is open source! Project page here: https://github.com/cxong/PepperTown
